thread.section_title: Jomashop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jomashop | www.jomashop.com | 8 of 280
thread.title: Joe Mirandi

author: Joe Mirandi
title: Joe Mirandi
text:
Searched around for the best price for my Omega and I kept coming up with Jomashop.com. I had never purchased from them so I didn't know what to expect. After reading some reviews and seeing all the positive feedback, I took a chance on them. I am very happy I did. Not only did I get the best possible price for my watch, I saved enough money to add two-day air delivery!
I received my watch right on time. It was wrapped so well, that you could have dropped it out of a plane and nothing would happen to it!
All in all, I am very satisfied with my purchase and with Jomashop.com.
I would recommend them to anyone looking to save money on the watch of their dreams.
